description: Smaller of two successive primes with a palindromic product.
links: P. De Geest, More palindromic products of integer sequences
mathematica: p=2; t={}; Do[q=NextPrime[p]; If[Reverse[x=IntegerDigits[p*q]]==x,AppendTo[t,p]]; p=q,{n,150000}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 05 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 04 2007
